title: AugmentedAffil
description: Data schema for augmented affiliation data in SciX Honeycomb

aff.description: Array of raw affil strings from the pub, one per author

aff_abbrev.description: Array of matched ADS canonical abbreviations

aff_country.description: Array of host countries of matched ADS affils

aff_canonical.description: Array of matched ADS canonical names

aff_facet_hier.description: Array of affil facet data for the UI

aff_id.description: Array of matched ADS affiliation IDs

aff_iso_country.description: Array of host country ISO Codes of matched ADS affils

author.description: Array of author names from the record

bibcode.description: ADS Bibliographic Code for the record (if any)

scix_id.description: SciX Public Identifier for the record
